description: ITEM 1 TREE: T1 Holly Crown lift to circa 2.5m. ITEM 2 TREE: T2 Sycamore Crown lift mainly pendulate branch ends to circa 3.5-4m. Reduce overall spread on lower crown by circa 2m (Pole work). ITEM 3 TREE: T3 Sycamore (small, leaning and close to the wall) Fell to ground level â€“(Do Not Poison Stump). ITEM 4 TREE: T4 Sycamore (larger, multi stemmed) Sever ivy. Light crown lift small secondary growth to circa 2m. ITEM 5 TREE: T5 Holly Coppice and allow to regrow as a shrub. ITEM 6 TREE: G1 Portuguese Laurel Monolith dead and dying stems to circa 1.8m. Habitat pile wood. On living stems, sever ivy and prune back laurel near building circa 1-1.5m and balance remainder
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
